original_text: And when he had called all the people unto him, he said unto them, Hearken unto me every one of you, and understand:
korean_text: 무리를 다시 불러 이르시되 너희는 다 내 말을 듣고 깨달으라

sentences.original_text: And when he had called all the people unto him
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 모든 사람을 자기에게 부르셨을 때

sentences.original_text: Hearken unto me every one of you
